t:type.name: IntervalIrrigationSchedule
t:type.t:description: Extension of IrrigationSchedule specifically for interval schedules

t:attribute.name: events
t:attribute.description: The list events within the schedule, which will always be of type IrrigationScheduleEvent

t:attribute.name: controller
t:attribute.description: The address of the controller to which the schedule applies

t:attribute.name: type
t:attribute.description: The type of schedule, which will always be of type INTERVAL

t:attribute.name: status
t:attribute.description: The current state of the schedule with respect to progress applying the events. UPDATING implies the schedule is currently being applied, APPLIED implies the schedule has been fully applied, FAILED implies at least one transition failed to be applied

t:attribute.name: days
t:attribute.description: The number of days in the interval

t:attribute.name: startDate
t:attribute.description: The date on which the interval schedule started
